item.description:
This is an adventure camp with many activities to choose from. Biking, kayaking, zip lining or just relaxing to name a few. It is best to visit the website. Don't let the photo's of all the young people put you off, this venue is for all ages that are young at heart. Visit clubgetaway.com for more info.

This is an all inclusive event, the food is delicious. They serve complimentary wine and beer with dinner each night. Arrive on Friday and leave on Monday.

The cost for this great adventure is $469.00. I may be able to get discounts depending on the number of people signing up. You will be responsible to individually pay by e-mailing or calling them at 860-927-3664. Plan on making your reservation sometime in January as I will keep you informed of any discounts that will be available.

Here is the deal, book by January 31st. with a $100.00 refundable deposit. Get $70.00 off from the price of $469.00 and a goodie bag with a Club getaway fleece, a waterproof pouch, designer sunglasses, a voucher for a free drink and a voucher for $75.00 off your next adventure in 2013. Sound good? Call at 800-643-8292 or go online.

Â 

Cheer's to another great adventure.
item.how_to_find_us: We may want to car pool for this event.
item.name: Adventure Camp
